works.description:
A website called home furnisher- which is http://www.homefurnisher.co.uk/mygallery-vid-292 has stolen my trademark logo, my images, used my website address which is http://www.geraldinemattisdesign.com. This individual of theft was warned by their inbox email/contact form to remove the information immediately. This individual has refused to remove content. Also they are using my old business trading address which means they could be reproducing my unique details. On my website it does say all rights reserved. I am angry about this with consent theft of individuals work. I want this individual to face legal action and either prison. My website as you see on the first page has logos and three images at the front. Whoever, this person is has no respect for peoples' hardwork.
If you google in Geraldine Mattis Ltd on the 3rd to 4th page you will see it and also they had a cheek tospell my name wrong -Gareldine Mattis Limited rather than Geraldine Mattis Limited with all my private details including mobile phone number, address and website. I want this removed now please. Many thanks, Geraldine Mattis
